thread.section_title: Middlesbrough sack Aitor Karanka before Manchester United clash – Metro
thread.title: Middlesbrough sack Aitor Karanka before Manchester United clash
thread.title_full: Middlesbrough sack Aitor Karanka before Manchester United clash

author: Chris Davie
title: Middlesbrough sack Aitor Karanka before Manchester United clash
text:
Middlesbrough have sacked Aitor Karanka. (AMA/Getty Images) Middlesbrough have confirmed the sacking of Aitor Karanka.
‘I’d like to thank Middlesbrough for a wonderful opportunity and the players, staff and all the people at the club who I have worked with,’ Karanka told the club’s official website.
‘I’d also like to thank the fans for their support. This club will always hold a special place for me and I wish everyone connected with Middlesbrough Football Club the very best for the future.’
More to follow…
MORE: Gary Neville urges Jose Mourinho to offer Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic two-year deal 
MORE: Antoine Griezmann hints Manchester United are yet to make Atletico Madrid an offer
